name: Warsaw
description: The capital of Poland, known for its resilient history and the beautifully reconstructed Old Town.

name: Kraków
description: The historic royal capital, famous for its medieval architecture and the vast Main Market Square.

name: Gdańsk
description: A stunning port city on the Baltic coast, known as the birthplace of the Solidarity movement.

name: Wrocław
description: Famous for its hundreds of small dwarf statues and its beautiful Market Square with the Gothic Town Hall.

name: Poznań
description: A major center for trade and industry, famous for its Renaissance Old Town and mechanical goats.
